content: Do not deviate from the plan - if deviations needed, STOP and ask user
Add once_cell dependency to Cargo.toml for Lazy<Regex> support
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after adding dependency
Create src/error.rs with BrpMcpError types and McpError conversions
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after creating error module
Add error module to main.rs and create helper macros
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after adding error module
Fix mutex unwrap in main.rs:102 with proper error handling
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after mutex fix
Replace all unwraps in format_discovery/engine.rs with proper error handling
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after engine fixes
Convert regex compilation in detection.rs to Lazy<Regex> pattern
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after regex fixes
Fix file path unwraps in cargo_detector.rs and watch_logger.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after file operation fixes
Convert test unwraps in format_discovery tests to proper assertions
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after test fixes
Run cargo clippy with strict settings and fix all issues
Run cargo +nightly fmt to format all code
Run cargo nextest run and review any test failures
Task subagent for code review focusing on duplication and complexity
Review subagent suggestions with user before proceeding
